001000_00000_01000_0001000100010001   //  addi $t0,$0,#1111
101011_00000_01000_0000000000000100   //  sw $t0,#4($0)		(tag=0x00, index=0x00, offset=0x04, one-way: w-hit )
001000_00000_01001_0000000000000001   //  addi $t1,$0,#0001
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000000   //  sw $t1,#0($0)		(tag=0x00, index=0x00, offset=0x00, one-way: w-miss)
